event.title: Lightning Talks - Call for speakers
event.description:
We are planning a fun evening of lightning talks and are calling for Speakers. 

Each talk needs to be about 12 minutes long, and will be followed by a few minutes for questions. The talks can be on any software related topic.

So far, we have:

- Jon Chesterfield giving a talk on Associative Memory

- Andrew Robertson giving a talk on six programming languages you'll never want to code in.

There is still time, so if you'd like to give a talk, please ping me an e-mail at [masked]

We'd also like to thank our Sponsor JetBrains, who have donated a 1 year single personal use licence to any of their JetBrains tool products, to be a prize in our raffle.

Look forward to hearing from you.

More details will follow
